snippet.title: Lambda Spellcrafting Academy - Development Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
New gameplay teaser for my upcoming game, Lambda Spellcrafting Academy.

Develop magical programming abilities while building spells. Lambda Spellcrafting is a card-based puzzle game where you build spells (programs) to solve puzzles. Fun for complete beginners or professional wizards.

The free demo is available on Steam today! Play the demo, and add it to your wishlist to be notified of updates and playtest opportunities.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2323860/Lambda_Spellcrafting_Academy/
